mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID,A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT,A.FIXED_CARD_REGNO AS FIXEDCARDREGNO,A.IC_PHYSICS_CODE AS ICPHYSICSCODE,A.IC_CODE AS ICCODE, G.ATTR_NAME AS ICTYPE,A.COP_ENT_NO AS COPENTNO,A.USE_ETPS_CODE AS USEETPSCODE,A.USE_ETPS_NAME AS USEETPSNAME,A.USE_ETPS_SCCD AS USEETPSSCCD, A.VALID_DATE AS VALIDDATE,B.Name AS VEHICLETYPECD,A.VEHICLE_NO AS VEHICLENO,E.ATTR_NAME AS FIXEDCARDSTATUS,A.REG_DATE AS REGDATE, A.RMK AS RMK,A.DEC_TIME AS DECTIME,H.CUSTOMS_NAME AS MASTERCUSCD,I.AREA_NAME AS AREACODE,A.BIZ_TYPE AS BIZTYPE,F.ATTR_NAME AS CHKSTATUS,A.DOC_TYPE AS DOCTYPE, A.RET_CHANNEL AS RETCHANNEL,A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO,A.CHK_TIME AS CHKTIME,A.INPUTER_CODE AS INPUTERCODE,A.INPUTER_NAME AS INPUTERNAME,A.INPUT_COP_NO AS INPUTCOPNO, A.INPUT_ETPS_SCCD AS INPUTETPSSCCD,A.INPUT_COP_NAME AS INPUTCOPNAME,A.CREATE_BY AS CREATE_BY,A.CREATE_NAME AS CREATENAME,A.CREATE_TIME AS CREATETIME,A.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATEBY, A.UPDATE_NAME AS UPDATENAME,A.UPDATE_TIME AS UPDATETIME,D.NAME AS VEHICLESORT FROM BSSP_SAS.SAS_FIXED_CARD_BSC A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CAR_TYPE B ON A.VEHICLE_TYPECD=B.CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CAR_SORT D ON A.VEHICLE_SORT=D.CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES E ON A.FIXED_CARD_STATUS=E.ATTR_VALUE AND E.DICTIONARY_VALUE='FIXED_CARD_STATUS' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES F ON A.CHK_STATUS=F.ATTR_VALUE AND F.DICTIONARY_VALUE='CHK_STATUS' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES G ON A.IC_TYPE=G.ATTR_VALUE AND G.DICTIONARY_VALUE='IC_TYPE' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_CUSTOMSFEC H ON A.MASTER_CUSCD=H.CUSTOMS_CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_AREA_CODE I ON A.AREA_CODE=I.AREA_CODE
